effect.shortEffect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.
effect.full: If this Pokémon is poisoned, it will heal for 1/8 of its maximum HP after each turn rather than taking damage. This includes bad poison.

description.diamond-pearl: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.platinum: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.black-white: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.black-2-white-2: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.x-y: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
description.sun-moon: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
description.sword-shield: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
